c74object.name: hoa.out~
c74object.digest: signal outlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~
c74object.description: hoa.out~ defines a signal outlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

inlet.digest: output signal to a hoa.process~ object's signal outlet

method.name: signal
method.digest: output signal in the corresponding hoa.process~ object's signal outlet
method.description: output signal in the corresponding hoa.process~ object's signal outlet

attribute.name: comment
attribute.description: Sets a description to the outlet which will be shown in the assist outlet of the hoa.process~ that load this hoa.out~. Only works if the extra parameter is greater than 0.

attribute.name: extra
attribute.description: Defines an extra outlet. Extra outlet are added to the "normal" instance outlet and can be used to receive signal from all instances.

c74object.discussion: hoa.out~ defines a signal outlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~

entry.name: Inlet 1 (signal)
entry.description: output signal to a hoa.process~ object's signal outlet.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: hoa.out~ defines a signal outlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~
